items.sentence: Tom has already been told he's required to do that.
I didn't realize Tom wanted me to do that with him.
I didn't realize Tom had never gone to high school.
The house has a dining room, a bedroom and a study.
It seems that the computer was infected by a virus.
It looks like Tom is having a hard time doing that.
Tom didn't get the promotion that he was expecting.
Tom was the one who told me Mary shouldn't do that.
When was the last time that you saw Tom doing that?
You're the most inconsiderate person I've ever met.
